report.name: x_sstacheress

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select: SELECT rpad(NVL(PI.ilibel,' '),50,' ') AS libelle_projet , rpad(ligne_bip.pid,4,' ') AS code_BIP , rpad(NVL(ligne_bip.pnom,' '),30,' ') AS libelle_ligne_BIP , rpad(CONSO.pid,4,' ') AS ligne_depart_BIP , rpad(NVL(etape.TYPETAP,' '),2,' ') AS typetap , rpad(NVL(CONSO.ecet,' '),2,' ') AS etape , rpad(NVL(CONSO.libetape,' '),30,' ') AS libelle_etape -- TD 712 , rpad(NVL(CONSO.acta,' '),2,' ') AS tache , rpad(NVL(CONSO.libtache,' '),30,' ') AS libelle_tache -- TD 712 , rpad(NVL(CONSO.acst,' '),2,' ') AS ss_tache --PID => sur 7 , rpad(NVL(CONSO.aist,' '),6,' ') AS id_ss_tache -- F.115 , rpad(NVL(CONSO.asnom,' '),30,' ') AS libelle_ss_tache , rpad(struct_info.sigdep || '/' || struct_info.sigpole,7,' ') AS sigle_DPG , rpad(NVL(directions.libdir,' '),30,' ') AS libelle_direction , DECODE(IS_RBDF_DPG(CONSO.codsg),'Y',rpad(NVL(ressource.rnom,' '),30,' ') ,NULL ) nom , DECODE(IS_RBDF_DPG(CONSO.codsg),'Y',lpad(NVL(TO_CHAR(CONSO.ident),' '),5,' ') ,NULL ) ident , TO_CHAR(rpad(NVL(CONSO.codsg,0),7,' ') ,'FM0000000') AS codsg_ress , DECODE(IS_RBDF_DPG(CONSO.codsg),'Y',rpad(NVL(CONSO.soccode,' '),4,' '),NULL ) soccode_ress , rpad(NVL(ligne_bip.metier,' '),3,' ') AS metier , lpad(NVL(TO_CHAR(CONSO.janvier, 'FM99990D00'),TO_CHAR(0, 'FM99990D00')),8,' ') AS janvier , lpad(NVL(TO_CHAR(CONSO.fevrier, 'FM99990D00'),TO_CHAR(0, 'FM99990D00')),8,' ') AS fevrier , lpad(NVL(TO_CHAR(CONSO.mars, 'FM99990D00'),TO_CHAR(0, 'FM99990D00')),8,' ') AS mars , lpad(NVL(TO_CHAR(CONSO.avril, 'FM99990D00'),TO_CHAR(0, 'FM99990D00')),8,' ') AS avril , lpad(NVL(TO_CHAR(CONSO.mai, 'FM99990D00'),TO_CHAR(0, 'FM99990D00')),8,' ') AS mai , lpad(NVL(TO_CHAR(CONSO.juin, 'FM99990D00'),TO_CHAR(0, 'FM99990D00')),8,' ') AS juin , lpad(NVL(TO_CHAR(CONSO.juillet, 'FM99990D00'),TO_CHAR(0, 'FM99990D00')),8,' ') AS juillet , lpad(NVL(TO_CHAR(CONSO.aout, 'FM99990D00'),TO_CHAR(0, 'FM99990D00')),8,' ') AS aout , lpad(NVL(TO_CHAR(CONSO.septembre, 'FM99990D00'),TO_CHAR(0, 'FM99990D00')),8,' ') AS septembre , lpad(NVL(TO_CHAR(CONSO.octobre, 'FM99990D00'),TO_CHAR(0, 'FM99990D00')),8,' ') AS octobre , lpad(NVL(TO_CHAR(CONSO.novembre, 'FM99990D00'),TO_CHAR(0, 'FM99990D00')),8,' ') AS novembre , lpad(NVL(TO_CHAR(CONSO.decembre, 'FM99990D00'),TO_CHAR(0, 'FM99990D00')),8,' ') AS decembre , NULL AS coutHTR , NULL AS coutenv , '"' || ligne_bip.dpcode || '"' AS DPCode --CODE_DOSSIER_PROJET , '"' || ligne_bip.icpi || '"' AS ProjCode --CODE_PROJET , '"' || ligne_bip.airt || '"' AS AppliCode --CODE_APPLICATION , '"' || TO_CHAR(conso.cafi) || '"' AS RessCAFI --CAFI , '"' || lpad(TO_CHAR(ligne_bip.codcamo),5,'0') || '"' AS CApayeurCode --CA_PAYEUR , '"' || lpad(TO_CHAR(PI.cada),5,'0') || '"' AS CADA --CADA --,CHR(13) AS retour , TYPE_RESSOURCE , CODE_PRESTATION , RPAD(NVL(MCI,' '),3,' ') MCI , DECODE(IS_RBDF_DPG(CONSO.codsg),'Y',pack_utile_cout.Get_Profil_Fi( CONSO.codsg, CONSO.cafi, CODE_PRESTATION, CONSO.ident, TO_CHAR(CONSO.cdeb,'DDMMYYYY'), CONSO.soccode, ressource.rtype, ligne_bip.metier, conso.niveau, ligne_bip.codcamo,ligne_bip.pid ),NULL ) PROFILE_FI --KRA 60727 , rpad(NVL ( TO_CHAR ( CONSO.date_deb_ini , 'DD/MM/YYYY' ) , TO_CHAR (' ') ), 10 , ' ') DATE_DEB_INI, rpad(NVL ( TO_CHAR ( CONSO.date_fin_ini , 'DD/MM/YYYY' ) , TO_CHAR (' ') ), 10 , ' ') DATE_FIN_INI, rpad(NVL ( TO_CHAR ( CONSO.date_deb_rev , 'DD/MM/YYYY' ) , TO_CHAR (' ') ), 10 , ' ') DATE_DEB_REV, rpad(NVL ( TO_CHAR ( CONSO.date_fin_rev , 'DD/MM/YYYY' ) , TO_CHAR (' ') ), 10 , ' ') DATE_FIN_REV, rpad(NVL(CONSO.statut_sstache,' '),2,' ') STATUT_SSTACHE, lpad(NVL( TO_CHAR (CONSO.duree_sstache ), ' ' ),5,' ') DUREE_SSTACHE, rpad(NVL(CONSO.param_sstache,' '),5,' ') PARAM_SSTACHE, lpad( TO_CHAR(ligne_bip.codsg), 7, '0') DPG_ligne, rpad(pack_arbitre.FIND_REF_DEMANDE(NULL,DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER,PI.PROJAXEMETIER,ligne_bip.PID),12, ' ') Ref_demande, rpad(PACK_ARBITRE.FIND_REF_DEMANDE_LIB(DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER,PI.PROJAXEMETIER,ligne_bip.PID), 80 , ' ') Ref_demande_Lib, --BIP32 CHANGE ( SELECT LIBTYET FROM TYPE_ETAPE, etape WHERE etape.TYPETAP = TYPE_ETAPE.TYPETAP AND ROWNUM = 1 ) TypeEtapeLib, DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER AS DpCopiAxeMetierCode , DECODE(DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER, NULL,NULL, DECODE( (SELECT DMPLIBEL FROM DMP_RESEAUXFRANCE WHERE TRIM(DMPNUM) = TRIM(DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER) AND ROWNUM = 1 ), NULL, '???', (SELECT DMPLIBEL FROM DMP_RESEAUXFRANCE WHERE TRIM(DMPNUM) = TRIM(DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER) AND ROWNUM = 1 )) ) AS DpCopiAxeMetierLib, PI.PROJAXEMETIER AS ProjAxeMetierCode , DECODE(PI.PROJAXEMETIER, NULL, NULL, DECODE( (SELECT DMPLIBEL FROM DMP_RESEAUXFRANCE WHERE TRIM(DMPNUM) = TRIM(PI.PROJAXEMETIER) AND ROWNUM = 1 ), NULL, '???', (SELECT DMPLIBEL FROM DMP_RESEAUXFRANCE WHERE TRIM(DMPNUM) = TRIM(PI.PROJAXEMETIER) AND ROWNUM = 1 )) ) AS ProjAxeMetierLib, CONSO.TACHEAXEMETIER AS TacheAxeMetierCode, DECODE(CONSO.TACHEAXEMETIER, NULL, NULL, DECODE( (SELECT DMPLIBEL FROM DMP_RESEAUXFRANCE WHERE TRIM(DMPNUM) = TRIM(CONSO.TACHEAXEMETIER) AND rownum = 1 ), NULL, '???', (SELECT DMPLIBEL FROM DMP_RESEAUXFRANCE WHERE TRIM(DMPNUM) = TRIM(CONSO.TACHEAXEMETIER) AND rownum = 1 )) ) AS TacheAxeMetierLib FROM TEMP_SSTACHE_RESS_FULL CONSO , ligne_bip , etape , proj_info PI , ressource , struct_info , directions , -- vue_dpg_perime VDP, DOSSIER_PROJET_COPI DPCOPI WHERE CONSO.ecet = etape.ecet AND CONSO.pid = etape.pid AND Ligne_Bip.Pid =Conso.Factpid AND PI.icpi =ligne_bip.icpi AND ligne_bip.codsg =struct_info.codsg AND struct_info.coddir =directions.coddir AND CONSO.ident =ressource.ident ---AND (CONSO.codsg =VDP.codsg --OR ligne_bip.codsg = VDP.codsg) AND PI.DP_COPI = DPCOPI.DP_COPI(+) ;

function.name: afterpform
function.textSource:
FUNCTION AfterPForm RETURN BOOLEAN IS BEGIN --delete the data from all temp tables DELETE FROM TEMP_SSTACHE_RESS; DELETE FROM TEMP_SSTACHE_RESS_FULL; --DELETE FROM TEMP_IDENT_RBDF; COMMIT; --get ALL resources at RBDF extended INTO TEMP_IDENT_RBDF /*INSERT INTO TEMP_IDENT_RBDF ( SELECT DISTINCT Str.IDENT FROM Situ_Ress_Full Str, CODSG_RBDF CR WHERE str.CODSG = CR.CODSG ); COMMIT;*/
--Preapre complete data to generate report with filters <<TEMP_sstache_ress>> INSERT INTO TEMP_sstache_ress (SELECT DECODE(tache.aistty, 'FF', tache.aistpid, tache.pid) factpid , TACHE.PID , NVL(LIBETAPETACHE.LIBSSTACHE,TACHE.ASNOM) ASNOM , tache.ecet , tache.acta , tache.acst , tache.aist , tache.tacheaxemetier , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 1, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) janvier , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 2, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) fevrier , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 3, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) mars , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 4, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) avril , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 5, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) mai , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 6, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) juin , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 7, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) juillet , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 8, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) aout , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 9, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) septembre , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 10, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) octobre , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 11, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) novembre , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb, 'MM')), 12, cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag, 0)) decembre , SRF.ident , SRF.codsg , SRF.soccode , SRF.niveau , SRF.cout , DECODE(libetapetache.libetape,'',libetapetachebips.etapelibel,libetapetache.libetape) libetape , DECODE(libetapetache.libtache,'',libetapetachebips.tachelibel,libetapetache.libtache) libtache , libetapetache.date_deb_ini , libetapetache.date_fin_ini , libetapetache.date_deb_rev , libetapetache.date_fin_rev , libetapetache.statut_sstache , libetapetache.duree_sstache , libetapetache.param_sstache --Fin KRA PPM 60727 , si1.cafi , DECODE(IS_RBDF_DPG(SRF.CODSG),'Y',ress.RTYPE,NULL ) TYPE_RESSOURCE , SRF.Prestation Code_Prestation , DECODE(IS_RBDF_DPG(SRF.CODSG),'Y',SRF.Mode_Contractuel_Indicatif ,NULL ) Mci , MAX(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb) cdeb FROM ligne_bip lb, situ_ress_full SRF, tache , cons_sstache_res_mois , datdebex , (SELECT ie.pid, ie.ecet, ie.libetape, it.acta, it.libtache, iss.asnom libsstache, iss.acst , iss.ADEB date_deb_ini, iss.AFIN date_fin_ini, iss.ANDE date_deb_rev, iss.ANFI date_fin_rev, iss.ASTA statut_sstache, iss.ADUR duree_sstache, iss.PARAM_LOCAL param_sstache FROM isac_etape ie, isac_tache it, isac_sous_tache iss WHERE ie.etape=it.etape AND ie.etape = iss.etape AND it.tache = iss.tache ) libetapetache , (SELECT lignebipcode, etapenum, etapelibel, tachenum, tachelibel, stachenum, stachelibel FROM BIPS_ACTIVITE bips ) libetapetachebips , STRUCT_INFO si1 , ressource ress WHERE cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb >= datdebex.datdebex AND TO_CHAR(cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb,'YYYY') =TO_CHAR(Datdebex.moismens,'YYYY') AND SRF.CODSG = si1.CODSG AND ress.IDENT = SRF.IDENT AND cons_sstache_res_mois.pid =tache.pid AND cons_sstache_res_mois.ecet =tache.ecet AND cons_sstache_res_mois.acta =tache.acta AND cons_sstache_res_mois.acst =tache.acst AND cons_sstache_res_mois.ident !=0 AND cons_sstache_res_mois.cusag !=0 AND DECODE(tache.aistty, 'FF', tache.aistpid, tache.pid)=lb.pid AND cons_sstache_res_mois.ident =SRF.ident AND (cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb >=SRF.datsitu OR SRF.datsitu IS NULL) AND (cons_sstache_res_mois.cdeb <=SRF.datdep OR SRF.datdep IS NULL) AND ( SRF.prestation NOT IN ('GRA', 'MO', 'IFO', 'INT', 'STA') OR SRF.prestation IS NULL) AND tache.pid = libetapetache.pid(+) AND tache.ecet = libetapetache.ecet(+) AND tache.acta = libetapetache.acta(+) AND tache.acst = libetapetache.acst(+) AND tache.pid = libetapetachebips.lignebipcode(+) AND tache.ecet = libetapetachebips.etapenum(+) AND tache.acta = libetapetachebips.tachenum(+) AND tache.acst = libetapetachebips.stachenum(+) GROUP BY tache.pid , DECODE(tache.aistty, 'FF', tache.aistpid, tache.pid) , tache.asnom , tache.ecet , tache.acta , tache.acst , tache.aist , tache.tacheaxemetier , SRF.ident, SRF.codsg, SRF.soccode, SRF.niveau, SRF.cout , libetapetache.libetape , libetapetache.libtache , libetapetache.libsstache , libetapetachebips.etapelibel , libetapetachebips.tachelibel , libetapetachebips.stachelibel , si1.cafi , ress.RTYPE , SRF.PRESTATION , SRF.MODE_CONTRACTUEL_INDICATIF , libetapetache.date_deb_ini , libetapetache.date_fin_ini , libetapetache.date_deb_rev , libetapetache.date_fin_rev , libetapetache.statut_sstache , libetapetache.duree_sstache , libetapetache.param_sstache ) ; COMMIT; --Apply remaining RBDF filters to collected data <<TEMP_SSTACHE_RESS_FULL>> INSERT INTO TEMP_SSTACHE_RESS_FULL (SELECT T.* FROM TEMP_sstache_ress t, ligne_bip lb WHERE t.PID = LB.PID AND ((EXISTS (SELECT * FROM CLICODE_RBDF clr WHERE LB.CLICODE = clr.CLICODE -- CLICODE RBDF CHECK )) /*OR (EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM TEMP_ident_rbdf ir WHERE t.IDENT = ir.IDENT ))*/ OR (EXISTS (SELECT * FROM CODSG_RBDF cr WHERE T.CODSG = CR.CODSG --- RESOURCE RBDF CHECK )) OR ( EXISTS (SELECT * FROM LIGNE_BIP L, CODSG_RBDF CR WHERE L.CODSG = CR.CODSG AND L.PID = T.PID)) ---PID RBDF CHECK ) ); COMMIT; RETURN (TRUE); END;
